description:
Thoughts?

In the past, when anyone attacked the #unitedStates, they normally got a bullet in the head, or at the least, arrested.  Not so for former #Microsoft CEO turned “know-it-all” on vaccines Bill Gates.  In a recent interview with The Financial Times, Gates told the people of the world that they didn’t “have a choice” in the matter. “Normalcy only returns when we largely vaccinate the entire population.”

That vaccination will come via vaccines that he has poured countless million into and he wants a return on his investment.

The interview, which took place on April 9, 2020, occurred just weeks after the US was shut down due to the hype and hysterics concerning what is clearly a hoax on the people of the world, #coronavirus.

Perhaps, we could look at bringing Gates to justice and reward his investment in other pharmaceuticals they use for lethal injection, or maybe rope…. or some copper and lead.

This man is an enemy of the people of the world and he’s doing it all for the sake of gaining for himself. #VaccineAgenda #GlobalHealthSecurityAgenda #PopulationControl #Event201
